scripts.start: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc --module commonjs --outDir build/ --noImplicitAny --sourceMap --target ES5 lib/*.ts && node build/main.js
scripts.debug: killall -9 node; ./node_modules/.bin/tsc --module commonjs --outDir build/ --noImplicitAny --sourceMap --target ES5 lib/*.ts && node-debug build/main.js
scripts.tunnel: export RPCNODE1=138.68.52.104; ssh -f -o ServerAliveInterval=60 -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no -N -L 9595:127.0.0.1:9595 root@${RPCNODE1}
